column5: This unit is located downtown in the Nueces Lofts. It's a clean flat with a full sized bed, futon, and walking distance to coffee shops, restaurants, bars and the beach (exactly 1 mile from Mcgee Beach). This is my second listing and this place is airb&b only, noone lives here. The unit has some cooking utensils (not for a huge dinner) and a coffee maker. We do supply a few coffee pods and coffee, but you may prefer your own.
